description: The 21:00 to 06:00 curfew will apply from Friday and two-thirds of French people will be affected.
title: Coronavirus: France extends overnight curfew as cases surge
title_page: Coronavirus: France extends overnight curfew as cases surge - BBC News

This information is regularly updated but may not reflect the latest totals for each country.
** The past data for new cases is a three day rolling average. Due to revisions in the number of cases, an average cannot be calculated for this date.
Source: Johns Hopkins University, national public health agencies and UN population data
